alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy Showers and Thunderstorms will impact portions of Nantucket, central Dukes and Barnstable Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 837 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Falmouth to 75 miles south of Aquinnah, in the ocean waters well south of Martha`s Vineyard. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding, from rainfall rates up to one inch per hour over the next 90 minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Barnstable, Falmouth, Nantucket, Brewster, Oak Bluffs, Edgartown, Tisbury, Yarmouth, Sandwich, Bourne, Dennis, Mashpee, Harwich, Chatham, Orleans, Eastham, Wellfleet, West Tisbury, Truro and Chilmark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
